column5: The MSc Digital Marketing Management at Cardiff Metropolitan University has been designed in conjunction with the Digital Marketing Institute and the needs of the digital industry. It will equip you with a wide range of digital and social media marketing knowledge and techniques. The aim of the degree is to develop digital marketers who can succeed at a managerial level in today's demanding digital marketing landscape.
column7: As a postgraduate, research or part-time student, the tuition fees you are charged will depend on the course you choose to study.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
